name: The Night Of The BEAST
description:
You have been cursed by a cosmic being known to the villagers as the "BEAST".

At night you must carry out the sacrifice of the victims to keep the monster and yourself alive.

Feed the beast inside the church with the villagers without the watchers seeing you.

Made in two days  for the ludum dare 46

CONTROLS: 

arrow keys or AWSD: move

Space or Enter: kill

twitter: @GamesSudo
